title: 2011/183/EU: Council Decision of 21 March 2011 appointing a member of the Court of Auditors
header:
25.3.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 79/13
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 March 2011
appointing a member of the Court of Auditors
(2011/183/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 286(5) thereof,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Parliament (1),
Whereas:
(1) Mr Hubert WEBER, member of the Court of Auditors, has resigned with effect from 1 January 2011.
(2) Mr Hubert WEBER should therefore be replaced for the remainder of his term of office,
main_body: Mr Harald WÖGERBAUER is hereby appointed member of the Court of Auditors for the period from 1 April 2011 to 31 December 2013.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 March 2011.
For the Council
The President
MARTONYI J.
(1)  Opinion of 8 March 2011 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
